TopicTitle: Long Night of Solace. Light cruiser.

Articles.Content:
After a kerbal mistake committed by Bob Kerman at KNP (Kerbal Nuclear Program) that put the whole planet in a nuclear winter (don't ask questions), the KSC builded a ship to escape from Kerbin with the rest of the Kerbalkind to Laythe. It's unknown the whereabouts of Valentina, Jeb and Bill. Bob died at KNP.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I used tweak scale, station parts expansion and near future solar panels.

Edited August 11, 2015 by Zais
So did they make it to Laythe in that terrifying looking spacecraft?

I'm a little busy those last days, I'm planing a permanent mission to Laythe so this was just a test run to see if the ship get to orbit.

And I also think that is terrifying too.

Edited August 15, 2015 by Zais
